content.rendered:
Best merchant services for fitness centers in Los Angeles.

We offer secure and reliable merchant accounts for gyms and fitness centers in Los Angeles. 

Accept Payments Now

From gyms to personal trainers, fitness studios to yoga studios, we offer safe and reliable ways to take payments from your members and clients.

  • Recurring Payments
  • Low Fees
  • Chargeback Management
Apply Today

Leading credit card payment services for fitness centers in Los Angeles.

Recurring Billing

Set up automatic recurring billing for your gym memberships and personal training sessions.

Chargeback Management

Minimize payment disputes with our advanced chargeback mitigation tools. 

Speak to an Expert

Gym POS systems.

Our Gym Point of Sale (POS) systems are designed to optimize operations at fitness studios and gyms. From member check-ins to processing payments for classes and merchandise, our POS simplifies the management of gym-related transactions. Customized features for scheduling, billing, and member management ensure a seamless experience for both gym owners and their clients. We prioritize efficiency and member satisfaction to help gym businesses thrive. 

Comprehensive reporting.

Our payment processing system offers comprehensive reporting for gyms and fitness studios. You can track membership sales, monitor attendance, and analyze revenue streams, gaining valuable insights to make informed decisions. These detailed reports help streamline operations and improve the overall member experience, allowing gym owners to optimize their businesses and achieve growth. 

01 02

Step 1

Apply for an account and get approved in as little as 24 hours. 

Step 2

Integrate with your existing software or get started with our tools. 

Step 3

Enjoy low fees and 24/7 customer support with a real person. 

Leading credit card processing for gyms and fitness centers.

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
